articles.headline: Henry rushes for 2 TDs to help sluggish Ravens to fifth straight win, 23-10 over Jets
articles.description: Derrick Henry scored two third-quarter touchdowns and the Baltimore Ravens recovered from a sleepy first half to beat the New York Jets 23-10 on Sunday for their fifth straight victory.

images.name: Ravens win fifth in a row as they take down the Jets
images.caption: The Ravens get two Derrick Henry touchdowns as they beat the Jets for their fifth win in a row.

articles.headline: Ravens win fifth in a row as they take down the Jets
articles.description: The Ravens get two Derrick Henry touchdowns as they beat the Jets for their fifth win in a row.

images.name: Ravens win fifth in a row as they take down the Jets
images.caption: The Ravens get two Derrick Henry touchdowns as they beat the Jets for their fifth win in a row.

articles.headline: NFL Week 12: Biggest questions, takeaways for every game
articles.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 12.

articles.headline: Bengals' Tee Higgins suffers concussion after hard fall to turf
articles.description: Bengals wide receiver Tee Higgins left Sunday's game against the Patriots after suffering a concussion in the fourth quarter.

articles.headline: Emanuel Wilson runs for 107 yards and 2 TDs as Packers pound Vikings 23-6
articles.description: Emanuel Wilson rushed for a career-high 107 yards and two touchdowns in his first career start and the Green Bay Packers defeated the Minnesota Vikings 23-6 on Sunday.

images.name: Packers hit Skol celebration after second J.J. McCarthy pick
images.caption: Evan Williams picks off J.J. McCarthy and the Packers D celebrates in the end zone with Skol celebration.

articles.headline: Packers pick up 23-6 division win over the Vikings
articles.description: The Packers get two Emanuel Wilson touchdowns and a couple J.J. McCarthy interceptions as they take down the Vikings at home.

images.name: Packers pick up 23-6 division win over the Vikings
images.caption: The Packers get two Emanuel Wilson touchdowns and a couple J.J. McCarthy interceptions as they take down the Vikings at home.
